# R Code Blocks

## Basic R code

```{r}
# Simple calculation
x <- 1:10
mean(x)
```

## R code with options

```{r echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE}
# Data frame manipulation
library(ggplot2)
df <- data.frame(
  x = rnorm(100),
  y = rnorm(100)
)

# Create a plot
ggplot(df, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal()
```

## R code with label and options

```{r my-analysis, fig.width=8, fig.height=6}
# Statistical analysis
model <- lm(mpg ~ wt + hp, data = mtcars)
summary(model)

# Predict values
predict(model, newdata = data.frame(wt = 3, hp = 150))
```

## Inline R code

The mean is `r mean(1:10)` and the sum is `r sum(1:5)`.

## R with dplyr pipeline

```{r}
library(dplyr)

mtcars %>%
  filter(mpg > 20) %>%
  select(mpg, cyl, wt) %>%
  arrange(desc(mpg)) %>%
  head(10)
```

## R with string operations

```{r}
# String manipulation
text <- "Hello, Quarto!"
toupper(text)
gsub("Quarto", "World", text)
```

## R with control structures

```{r}
# For loop
for (i in 1:5) {
  print(paste("Iteration", i))
}

# If-else
if (TRUE) {
  message("Condition is true")
} else {
  message("Condition is false")
}

# Function definition
my_function <- function(x, y = 2) {
  x * y + sqrt(x)
}

my_function(4)
```
